root.name: Cuban Missile Crisis: The Aftermath
root.description: OverviewThe game is based on the alternate history future where a U-2 is shot down leading to a nuclear apocalypse and then World War 3. During said world war the USSR invade Europe and the Middle East with France and Germany defending against them, whilst trying to move the European public to Central Africe, Britain and the Americans form an alliance and try and secure South America and South Africa for themselves, and China wages war against the USSR.The player follows each nation throughout each campaign, warring against the rest.System RequirementsWindows 98/ME/2000/XP. NOT VISTA OR W7!! (It does work on Windows 7, but not every time)Pentium III 1GHz or equal256 MB RAM3D-accelerator AGP 4x with 64 MB RAMSound adapter2 GB HDD
